issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Logging
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with logging and log messages.

fields.description: To enable perflogging, root logging has to be set to DEBUG. Provide a way to to independently configure perflogger and root logger levels.

comments.body: [~sershe] Could you review this patch? Small changes to set perflogger level via -hiveconf or via log4j2.properties file.

+1
Does it need to be added to HiveConf? hive will complain about incorrect property  otherwise, I suspect
The key's specified via -hiveconf are added as system property directly. There are no hive config equivalent to those properties. We don't have to add this to HiveConf.

hmm, is this different from --hiveconf? hiveconf is used for HiveConf stuff, which may not be validated on that path, but is validated at least on some other paths. It should probably be validated if not. But, as long as it works now, oh well. +1

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12801845/HIVE-13671.1.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.
